job_tasks.phrase: Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes setting high-level plans and policies for the use and management of an AI feature within the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the operational aspects and workflows (DevOps) related to the AI system (M365 Copilot).

job_tasks.phrase: Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the core task of integrating and deploying AI-powered solutions into the existing platform.
Advising on data control in the context of an AI implementation relates to governance and strategic management of data usage.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on building and maintaining services that enhance an existing platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: This involves guiding users on effective tool adoption aligned with business objectives and guidelines, contributing to the strategic realization of value.
This phrase relates to the project management and execution aspect of software development, breaking down concepts into actionable work items.

job_tasks.phrase: making sure they're done on time and within budget
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the project execution and delivery responsibilities, ensuring projects are completed efficiently and within constraints.
This describes the task of ensuring ongoing progress and momentum in project execution.
This indicates responsibility for managing and executing tasks effectively within a project.

job_tasks.phrase: make sure all deliverables meet the required standards
job_tasks.justification: This pertains to quality assurance and ensuring the successful completion of project outputs according to specifications.

soft_skills.phrase: You will collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams.
ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated.
work closely with the team and stakeholders.
solve problems as they come up
You'll need to adapt to changes

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development, integration, strategy, and operational tasks related to the Microsoft 365 platform and its M365 Copilot feature. There are no tasks related to core GenAI model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering (Macro-Category B). The role involves implementing and managing an existing AI capability within a software ecosystem, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is specific about the technologies (M365, Copilot) and the nature of the work (scale-up, implementation, strategy, DevOps user stories). The tasks clearly fall into software engineering and platform management, with AI integration as a key component, making the profile assignment straightforward.
